column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Tonkotsu ramen 9/10 very good.. It was slightly creamy
column3: and I got it spicy which was delicious. The ramen comes with 2 pieces of pork belly that has a lot of fat
column4: but it's not quite a bad thing because it's so good and when you put it in your mouth it melts away. My only regret was not adding more vegetables because the portion isnt as big as I thought it'd be
